scripts.build: npm run ensure_install && (npm run clean ; npx tsc || true)
scripts.dev: npm run ensure_install && (npm run clean ; npm run tsc_watch & npm run server_watch)
scripts.upgrade: rm -fdr node_modules package-lock.json && npx -y npm-check-updates -u && npm i && cp -v node_modules/gl-matrix/esm/* dist/third-party/gl-matrix/ && cp -v node_modules/webgl-lint/webgl-lint.js dist/third-party/
